content.name: ATF Valkyrie VRO Balance
content.description:
[h1][b]THIS IS CURRENTLY IN BETA FOR TESTING THE BALANCE[/b][/h1]
This mod is a patch fo ArgonMatt's ATF Valkyrie Frigate that adds VRO balance. This simply tunes the ship's hull and physics while adding an Internal Shield Generator.
Original Mod: [url=steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2901786607]ArgonMatt's ATF Valkyrie[/url]
content.author: EagleDelta

text.name: АргонМэтт Валькирия VRO
text.description: Мод добавляет новый корабль Валькирия на Терран верфь
text.author: EagleDelta
